solution_line_template: Katherine's junior takes {naomi_extra_time_fraction}*{katherine_time_per_website} = <<{naomi_extra_time_fraction}*{katherine_time_per_website}={additional_hours_naomi}>>{additional_hours_naomi} more hours to build a similar website as Katherine.

The total number of hours Katherine's junior takes to build a website is {katherine_time_per_website}+{additional_hours_naomi} = <<{katherine_time_per_website}+{additional_hours_naomi}={naomi_time_per_website}>>{naomi_time_per_website} hours.

If Katherine gave her junior {num_websites_for_naomi} websites to build, her junior spent {num_websites_for_naomi}*{naomi_time_per_website} = <<{num_websites_for_naomi}*{naomi_time_per_website}={total_hours_naomi}>>{total_hours_naomi} hours on building the {num_websites_for_naomi} websites.
